column1: The Purple Pig////Foodies: Welcome to Chicago. One of everyone's favorite places
column2: so it gets very crowded. With many great menu items
column3: it's easy to understand why people go back again and again. While it skews toward the heavier side
column4: we've found a lot of dishes to help keep it light (the charred octopus is outstanding). At the same time
column5: we enviously gawk at all the delicious-looking bone marrow being served at many of the tables (perhaps go on a temperate day so you can work it off with a walk along the River).
